extendedInfo.description: Can you recognize all the characters? You will be given one character poster and you have to guess correct answer. Correct answer makes you win coins. If you stuck up, You can ask your facebook/twitter friends. You can use hints.Functions:- Categorized Characters (Comics, Movie /  TV Shows)- Every categories contains 30 postersHints :- Show character (s)- Ask facebook/twitter friendsExtras :- Rate us for speed up updates- Give your requirement or ideas on supportandroid@apptopper.netTags: Movie,character,cartoon,animation character,guess the,persona,comics,super hero,superhero,horror,animation,action,comedy,romance,tv series,vampires,action thriller
